divs: Sighting Detailsmy husband and I witnessed a white light flying over us while in our driveway.without blinking out any other lights flew in a curved direction and disappeared into the clouds.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Leominster
There were no other sightings in Leominster on or around September 1st 2011
Summary: A stationary white light that flew in a small curve.no craft visible and disappeared in clouds
